quality.summary_txt: Quality signifies long term financial performance of a company vis-à- vis its competitors in the industry. We believe high quality companies with consistent record of financial performance will reward investors in the long run.

score.text: 59.0% of your portfolio has Average or Below Average Quality

valuation.summary_txt: Valuation refers to attractiveness of the company at its current stock price by looking at its past financial performance and valuation matrices. We believe valuation helps the investor to estimate the timing of entry and exit in stocks.

score.text: Only 43.0% of your portfolio has Very Attractive or Attractive Valuation

fin_trend.summary_txt: Financial trend analyses result of the company in the recent quarters. We believe companies which have been trending higher on financial trend in the latest periods have potential to generate returns in the short term.

score.text: 63.0% of your portfolio has Positive or better Financial Trend

liquidity.summary_txt: While selling stocks with liquidity issues, you may face longer time or you may not get exit at your desired price.

score.text: None of your portfolio stocks seem to have liquidity issues

issue_due_txt: Quantity held is more than 10% of the stock’s 1 month average volume or
